name: Notion Template Launch Checklist
description: Quickly Launch & Sell Your Notion TemplatesIf you're a Notion creator it can be difficult to keep track of all the details needed to launch your next product. Whether you're a beginner or advanced creator, the process can be a lot.This template solves all of your problems by giving you an easy-to-use checklist so you can prepare, publish and promote your Notion templates. With this template you can: Learn where to sell your templates Create stunning product designs Learn where to promote you
features: Learn where to sell your templates; Create stunning product designs; Learn where to promote your templates; Keep track of the important details; Save time and stay organized; Generate new checklists for each product; Save completed checklists in your archive; Start selling faster on platforms like Gumroad, Notionland, Notionway, Prototion, Notionery, Notionjoy, Etsy, and more.; PrepareGet your template ready to be released with a simple checklist of all the details needed to do so.; PublishThe Notion community is a big place, so it's a necessity for you to know which marketplaces you should be selling your product on.
